TopicTitle: cant download or patch ksp v.90

Articles.Content:
I keep trying to update ksp to beta than ever but the patcher keeps saying

rsync: read error: Software caused connection abort (113)

rsync error: error in rsync protocol data stream (code 12) at /home/lapo/package/rsync-3.0.9-1/src/rsync-3.0.9/io.c(764) [receiver=3.0.9]

rsync: writefd_unbuffered failed to write 4 bytes to socket [generator]: Broken pipe (32)

rsync error: error in rsync protocol data stream (code 12) at /home/lapo/package/rsync-3.0.9-1/src/rsync-3.0.9/io.c(1532) [generator=3.0.9]

rsync exited with code 12: Error in rsync protocol data stream

at 47% and when i tried to download ksp from the website it says invalid token.

The KSP servers are being slammed by the number of people trying to update. Patcher is particularly unreliable in the first few days after each release, so you may need to download from the KSP Store using a download manager (DownThemAll! for Firefox works well) or just wait a few days.
